name: Minute Fishing
description:
Minute Fishing is a very simplistic game in which you have to catch as many fish as possible in one minute.

Each fish scores a different number of points :

  • The normal fish (grey): 2 points
  • The rare fish (orange): 10 points
  • Legendary fish (purple): 25 points
The game controls are simple: click on a fish and drag it to your boat.

I hope you will have a good time on my game. Don't hesitate to leave a comment, this is the first (serious) video game I've invested in and taken the time to finish :D

Have Fun !

Minethan
